meanings.definition: A period of time before a game where players practice shooting.
meanings.sent1: During the shootaround, the basketball players focused on improving their shooting skills.
meanings.sent2: The coach scheduled a shootaround to help the team prepare for the upcoming game.
meanings.sent3: The shootaround turned into a friendly competition to see who could make the most baskets.
meanings.sent4: The shootaround was like a mini training session to fine-tune their shooting accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The players always looked forward to the shootaround as a chance to showcase their shooting abilities.
